mapper.select: select cno, bno, pcno, "comment" , commenter, reg_date , up_date from t_comment where bno = #{bno} order by reg_date, cno
mapper.delete: delete from t_comment where cno = #{cno} and commenter = #{commenter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment (bno, pcno, comment, commenter, reg_date, up_date) VALUES (#{bno}, #{pcno}, #{comment},#{commenter} , now(), now());
